name: Excavate Research and Analysis Pvt Ltd
overview:
Excavate Research Advanced Analytics team blends deep analytical skills with the capability to deal with high volume complex data sources, integrate data across platforms, and extract business intelligence using high–end data mining tools and techniques.

Ever since our inception, we have rapidly grown and our team has served clients globally. As an organization, we also demonstrate a commitment to assist employed and unemployed active jobseekers to obtain good jobs and better opportunities for themselves. Our involvement in these initiatives has started resulting in long term employment and bonding.

Our people have held key positions in leading Analytics firms in India. They bring with them their expertise in developing and deploying advanced analytics models to help our clients in Finance, Retail, Banking, and Telecommunications industry.

Along with providing end to end market research services to direct clients, we act as a Data Processing partner for many international research firms including Toluna, Ipsos, Joe-Jackman and Kadence International. We support their research operations across many verticals including the services listed below:

  • Data Processing/Cross Tabulation (Quantum, UNCLE &
    WINCROSS); Tracker studies
  • Survey Programming (SPSS Dimensions, Confirmit & SSI)
  • Data population into reports
  • Stimulator Design
  • Utility Calculation
  • Translation and Open End Coding
  • Data cleaning, Data merging, Data preparation.
  • Dashboard KPI’s: Our offline/web based Dashboards are an innovative way to efficiently collect, track and evaluate data.

Our dedicated teams of analysts serve our global clients by tactically blending analytics process/framework, methodology, data management capabilities and unmatched competence in high–end analytics.

We at Excavate provide comprehensive operational services and data analytics to the market research industry. Our focus is data and our role is not only to help you process data in the results you want to see, but to also take it a step further and help analyze and push those results for deeper insights.
